banner.title: Strong Credit Opens Doors
banner.description1: Whether you’re looking for the fastest boost or the largest long-term credit improvement, CreditBolt provides powerful credit building solutions
banner.title1: Great combinations for a complete credit profile
banner.title2: Build revolving and installment credit with these product combos

dashboard.cscombo: After you open your first account, look for “Explore our Products” in your account dashboard to add products and complete your credit building combo.

fico.title: CreditBolt can positively impact factors that determine 90% of your FICO Score
fico.description: Engineered for bigger and better credit on your terms
fico.subDescription: Impact Factors: Payment history (35%), Amount of Credit (30%), Length of Credit History (15%), Credit Mix (10%)

journey.title: Whether you’re just starting your credit journey or in the process of rebuilding your credit, we are here for you.

contactUs.title: Want to know more?
contactUs.location: Chat with a real live person based in Austin, Texas.
contactUs.chat: Chat Monday - Friday 8am to 5pm CT. After hours please leave a message and we'll follow up with you the next business day​.

trust.title: Credit building and security
trust.subTitle: only a real bank can provide.
trust.description: CreditBolt is part of a FDIC-insured bank, so you know your money and your personal information are safe and secure.

magnum.name: MAGNUM
features: Build a large amount of credit with a low monthly payment
Build $2,000 to $30,000 of installment credit history
Designed to build large credit – not savings
Starting at just $30 per month
magnum.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 86 points
magnum.price_des: in 12 months for MAGNUM 10000 accountholders with a starting credit score of 550 or less, for all accounts opened in 2021 with 12 or more months of account activity that made 12 on-time payments.

revolv.name: Revolv
revolv.description: Fastest way to establish and improve credit
features: Build up to $3,000 of revolving credit
Revolv can rapidly improve your credit utilization – and score
$99 per year – NO monthly payment required
revolv.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 62 points
revolv.price_des: for Revolv accountholders with a starting credit score under 550 who opened an account in Q1 2023 and made optional monthly savings payments between $15 and $45.

instal.name: Instal
instal.description: Entry level account for new builders
features: Balances building credit with building savings
Build up to $1,100 of installment credit
Starting at just $28 per month
instal.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 45 points
instal.price_des: for Instal/CS Max accountholders with a starting credit score under 550 who opened an account in Q1 2023 and made at least 3 on-time payments.

terms.title: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT PROCEDURES FOR OPENING A NEW ACCOUNT:
terms.description: To help the government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, and the theft of your identity, Federal law requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens an account. What this means for you: When you open an account, we will ask for your name, address, tax identification number (social security number or employer identification number), date of birth, and possibly other information that will allow us to identify you. We may also ask to see your driver's license or other identifying documents.

proud.title: We don't hide the small print.
proud.subTitle: We're proud of it.

company: Austin Capital Bank SSB, Member FDIC.

banner.title: CreditBolt Revolv
banner.title1: We increase your credit score FAST by lowering your credit utilization
banner.subTitle: Build credit fast without a credit card

fico.title: The fastest way to improve your credit score?
fico.subTitle: Lower your credit utilization.
fico.subDescription: Credit utilization is your account balance divided by your credit limit. It is typically calculated as the percentage (%) of your credit limit you are using on the statement date of your account.

revolv.name: Revolv
features: Quickly build $1,000 of revolving credit
Designed to lower utilization ASAP — the fastest way to boost
Just $99 a year
Set it and forget it — no monthly payments required. Add an optional monthly savings payment at any time to get the most out of Revolv

revolvSaving.name: Revolv
revolvSaving.description: Fastest way to improve credit & build savings
revolvSaving.pi_title: Add a monthly payment to unlock all the benefits of Revolv
features: Adding an optional monthly payment boosts Revolv by adding payment history, optimizing utilization, and can unlock higher limits
100% of every monthly payment goes directly to building your savings
Make three on-time payments in a row and we’ll bump up your Revolv account’s limit — unlock all credit bumps and build up to $3,000 in revolving credit

revolv.proud: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 62 points for Revolv accountholders with a starting credit score under 550 who opened an account in Q1 2023 and made optional monthly savings payments between $15 and $45.

price.title: Instal helps you build credit and savings
price.title2: CS Max is designed to help build larger and longer credit over building savings
price.sub: Instal and CS Max are Credit Builder Installment Loans designed to help strengthen your credit profile.
price.planSub: Choose the best CreditBolt Installment loan for you based on monthly payment, term length, and how much installment credit is reported. CreditBolt plans are secured and do not provide cash on signing.
